name: payload Trigger
payload Trigger
payload Trigger
payload Trigger
Fertilizante 1
format:
<script>
this.scope.on = {payload: 1};
this.scope.off = {payload: 0};
</script>
<md-button
   ng-touchstart="send(on)"
   ng-mousedown="send(on)"
   ng-touchend="send(off)"
   ng-mouseup="send(off)">
       Fertilizante 1
</md-button>
